mapper.select: SELECT USERID, TODO, REGDATE FROM todolist WHERE USERID = #{userId} AND REGDATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todolist VALUES(#{userId}, #{todo}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT A.USERID, A.TODO, A.REGDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY USERID ORDER BY REGTIME DESC) AS ROWNUM , USERID , TODO , REGDATE FROM todolist WHERE USERID = #{userId} AND REGDATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) A WHERE A.ROWNUM = '1'
